content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual receptionist. Can I please get your name to start setting up your appointment?
Uh, my name? Oh yes, it’s Betty Thompson, I think.
Thank you, Betty! Could you please provide your home address so we know where to send our technician?
Oh dear, it’s… 532 Maple Avenue, in Crestwood. Is that what you need?
Yes, that’s perfect, thank you. Could you tell me what kind of service you need today? For example, is it electrical, plumbing, or heating and cooling?
I think it’s the electricity. My lights are acting strange, coming on and off by themselves.
Thank you for letting us know, Betty. We can definitely help with electrical issues. When would be a good time for our technician to visit? Please let me know what days and times work best for you.
Um, I think Thursday afternoon? Or is that not when you work?
Thursday afternoon is usually available. Let me quickly check our schedule for you.
Good news! We have an opening on Thursday afternoon. Shall I confirm your appointment for then?
Yes, please confirm it. I hope the lights behave until then!
Your appointment is confirmed for Thursday afternoon, Betty. If you have any questions or need to reschedule, just let us know. We'll send a reminder before your appointment. Have a great day!
